caption.text:
For more than 60 years—and as the sole woman French New Wave filmmaker—#AgnesVarda introduced new ways of making, casting, and imagining movies. In a tribute to the film pioneer and artist, who passed away this spring, Rajendra Roy (@rajendraroymoma), our Celeste Bartos Chief Curator of Film, and video producer Natasha Giliberti (@tanasha_g) discuss Varda’s indelible influence on the way we see and connect with people in the world. Hear their conversation on #MoMAmagazine: mo.ma/varda (link in bio)
…
